long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the dark and bold world of Goth Mikasa with this captivating live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A stylish interface featuring gothic elements and dark tones that reflect Mikasa’s fierce and mysterious character.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Mikasa’s powerful and stoic presence.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Attack on Titan-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as bold and unique as Mikasa’s gothic style.
